me_no_target: The object of your kiss is absent.
actor_room: $n looks at $s empty arms and sighs.
me_room: You look at your empty arms and sigh.

actor_me: $n sweeps you into $s arms and kisses you long and deeply.
me_actor: You sweep $M into your arms and kiss $M long and deeply.
